summary: The diff implements post-sign-in dashboard navigation by wiring the HeroSection “Get Started” button to call `onOpenSignIn` with a success callback (`onNavigateToDashboard`). However, the BuildRequest constraint to apply changes ONLY to the element identified by the provided XPath cannot be verified from the diff, and multiple non-target files/utilities were modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply changes ONLY to the element identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[3]/div[2]/div[2]/button[1], and ensure no other buttons/elements outside that XPath have their behavior changed.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows behavior-related wiring changes spanning multiple components (new props and callback plumbing), so the change is not isolated to a single, clearly-identifiable DOM element per the XPath constraint. The diff does not provide evidence mapping the modified Button to the specified XPath, nor does it prove no other elements were affected.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded URL parameter/sessionStorage utilities (get/store/clear persisted parameters, hash-query parsing helpers) unrelated to the requested post-sign-in navigation change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is narrowly about updating one CTA button to trigger sign-in then navigate to /dashboard; URL parameter persistence utilities are not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state updates adding new_feature_requests entries (AR-1/AR-2).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request changes to project tracking/state files.
